title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 17, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 17, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Ruby
items.content_text:
### Implementations/Compilers

*   [Natalie (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/natalie-lang/natalie) - Natalie is a Ruby compiler that provides an ahead-of-time compiler using C++ and gcc/clang as the backend.
items.content_html:
Implementations/Compilers

  • Natalie (‚≠ê1k) - Natalie is a Ruby compiler that provides an ahead-of-time compiler using C++ and gcc/clang as the backend.

items.title: Awesome Keycloak
items.content_html:
Community Extensions

  • Keycloak GraphQL API by @blevine (‚≠ê11)

items.title: Awesome Web Archiving
items.content_text:
### Tools & Software / Acquisition

*   [SiteStory](http://mementoweb.github.io/SiteStory/) - A transactional archive that selectively captures and stores transactions that take place between a web client (browser) and a web server. *(Stable)*
items.content_html:
Tools & Software / Acquisition

  • SiteStory - A transactional archive that selectively captures and stores transactions that take place between a web client (browser) and a web server. (Stable)

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Communication / File Sharing

*   [NearDrop (‚≠ê5.3k)](https://github.com/grishka/NearDrop) - An unofficial Google Nearby Share/Quick Share app for macOS. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/localsend/localsend) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")

### Gaming Software / System Related Tools

*   [PlayCover (‚≠ê9.7k)](https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover) - Run iOS apps and games on Apple Silicon Macs with mouse, keyboard and controller support. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software") ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")](https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover)
items.content_html:
Communication / File Sharing

  • NearDrop (‚≠ê5.3k) - An unofficial Google Nearby Share/Quick Share app for macOS.

Gaming Software / System Related Tools

  • PlayCover (‚≠ê9.7k) - Run iOS apps and games on Apple Silicon Macs with mouse, keyboard and controller support.

items.title: Awesome Love2d
items.content_text:
### Distribution

*   [lover (‚≠ê31)](https://github.com/Wolfyxon/lover) - Bringing the joys of rust's package manager (`Cargo`) to love.
items.content_html:
Distribution

  • lover (‚≠ê31) - Bringing the joys of rust's package manager (Cargo) to love.

items.title: Awesome Crypto Papers
items.content_text:
### Specific topics / Post-quantum cryptography

*   [Kyber and Dilithium](https://cryptography101.ca/kyber-dilithium) - These lectures describe Kyber (ML-KEM) and Dilithium (ML-DSA), the quantum-safe lattice-based key encapsulation and signature schemes that were standardized in August 2024 by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST).
items.content_html:
Specific topics / Post-quantum cryptography

  • Kyber and Dilithium - These lectures describe Kyber (ML-KEM) and Dilithium (ML-DSA), the quantum-safe lattice-based key encapsulation and signature schemes that were standardized in August 2024 by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST).

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Utilities

*   [sesh (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/joshmedeski/sesh) - Sesh is a CLI that helps you create and manage tmux sessions quickly and easily using zoxide.
items.content_html:
Utilities

  • sesh (‚≠ê1.1k) - Sesh is a CLI that helps you create and manage tmux sessions quickly and easily using zoxide.

Design Inspiration

items.title: Awesome Microservices
items.content_text:
### Security / Scala

*   [Cerbos Hub](https://www.cerbos.dev/product-cerbos-hub) - Authorization management system for authoring, testing, and deploying access policies. Built scalable, fine-grained authorization in a microservice architecture.
items.content_html:
Security / Scala

  • Cerbos Hub - Authorization management system for authoring, testing, and deploying access policies. Built scalable, fine-grained authorization in a microservice architecture.

items.title: Awesome Ai Tools
items.content_text:
### Text / Productivity

*   [AnkiDecks AI](https://anki-decks.com) - Create Flashcards 10x faster. Generate Anki Flashcards from any File or Text with AI.
items.content_html:
Text / Productivity

  • AnkiDecks AI - Create Flashcards 10x faster. Generate Anki Flashcards from any File or Text with AI.

items.title: Awesome Godot
items.content_text:
### 2D / Godot 3

*   [Blipshift (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/GaidamakUA/blipshift) - Simple top-down moving platforms game.
*   [Circle Jump (‚≠ê142)](https://github.com/kidscancode/circle_jump) - Mobile arcade game, addicting and enjoyable. How-to-made tutorial is available, so you can recreate it yourself and learn Godot.
*   [Haldric (‚≠ê368)](https://github.com/wesnoth/haldric) - Official work-in-progress reimplementation of Battle for Wesnoth.
*   [Memory Game (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/Tzoop/MemoryGame) - Simple Memory game.

### 3D / Godot 4

*   [Thrive (‚≠ê3.2k)](https://github.com/Revolutionary-Games/Thrive/) - A free, open-source game about the evolution of life (Mono).

### 3D / Godot 3

*   [Rapid Rescue (‚≠ê75)](https://github.com/Azza292/RapidRescue) - Rapid Rescue is a local multiplayer strategy game inspired by Labyrinth.

### Demos / Godot 3

*   [Realistic Water Shader (‚≠ê814)](https://github.com/godot-extended-libraries/godot-realistic-water) - Realistic 3D water shader with foam and caustics.
*   [The Tower (‚≠ê28)](https://github.com/Relintai/the_tower) - A voxel-based parkour game to show the capabilities of the Voxelman module.

### Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

*   [3D Auto Collision Generator (‚≠ê60)](https://github.com/ThGnommy/godot_3d_auto_collision_generator) - Generate collision for multiple 3D objects in one click.
*   [CReverter (Composite Reverter)](https://codeberg.org/svetogam/creverter) - Memento-based undo/redo utility that supports composition.
*   [Cyclops Level Builder (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/blackears/cyclopsLevelBuilder) - A level builder for quick prototypes and proof-of-concepts.
*   [Dialogue Manager (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/nathanhoad/godot_dialogue_manager) - A simple but powerful text based branching dialogue editor and runtime. *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) (‚≠ê51)](https://github.com/tavurth/godot-fft) - Fast Fourier Transform in GDScript.
*   [Friflo.Engine.ECS (‚≠ê174)](https://github.com/friflo/Friflo.Json.Fliox/blob/main/Engine/README.md) - High-performance C# ECS with simple API. Supports .NET, WASM/WebAssembly, Native AOT, Godot, Unity, MonoGame, ... *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [GdUnit4 (‚≠ê750)](https://github.com/MikeSchulze/gdUnit4) - Godot Unit Testing Framework.
*   [Godot Spin Button (‚≠ê99)](https://github.com/yudinikita/godot-spin-button) - Horizontal Selector with extended options.
*   [HTerrain (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/Zylann/godot_heightmap_plugin) - Heightmap-based terrain. Supports texture painting, colouring, holes, level of detail and grass. *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [Importality (‚≠ê414)](https://github.com/nklbdev/godot-4-importality) - raster graphics and animations importers: Aseprite, Krita, Pencil2D, Piskel, Pixelorama and others.
*   [Input Helper (‚≠ê934)](https://github.com/nathanhoad/godot_input_helper) - A helper for detecting input devices and remapping controls. *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [Orchestrator (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/Vahera/godot-orchestrator) - Dialog and visual-scripting subsystem for 2D and 3D games.
*   [Scene Manager (‚≠ê470)](https://github.com/glass-brick/Scene-Manager) - Make nice and customizable scene transitions in one line of code. *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [SignalVisualizer (‚≠ê518)](https://github.com/Ericdowney/SignalVisualizer) - Displays the current scene's signals and connections in a easy to read graph and tree dock.
*   [Simplified Flight Simulation library (‚≠ê238)](https://github.com/fbcosentino/godot-simplified-flightsim) - A library that helps you create a simple airplane/helicopter/spaceship flight simulator. *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [SmartShape2D (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/SirRamEsq/SmartShape2D) - A 2D terrain tool. *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [Virtual Joystick (‚≠ê852)](https://github.com/MarcoFazioRandom/Virtual-Joystick-Godot) - A virtual joystick for touchscreens. Simple to use and with useful options. *(Godot 3 and 4)*

### Plugins and scripts / Godot 3

*   [2D Day/Night Cycle (‚≠ê349)](https://github.com/hiulit/Godot-3-2D-Day-Night-Cycle) - A ‚òÄÔ∏è Day / üåî Night cycle for 2D.
*   [2D Destructible Objects (‚≠ê411)](https://github.com/hiulit/Godot-3-2D-Destructible-Objects) - A script that takes a sprite, divides it into blocks and makes them explodeüí•.
*   [Anima (‚≠ê740)](https://github.com/ceceppa/anima) - Run sequential and parallel animations with less code compared to Tween.
*   [AutoColliders (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/graycastle/godot-AutoColliders) - Allows the automatic generation of colliders for Sprites, with planned expansion to handle 3D meshes in the future.
*   [BoxCam2D (‚≠ê19)](https://github.com/sarooptech/BoxCam2D) - Simplest way to implement grid-based 2D camera movement.
*   [CRT Shader (‚≠ê312)](https://github.com/hiulit/Godot-3-2D-CRT-Shader) - A Godot shader that simulates CRT Displays with many shader parameters.
*   [CSG Mesh Exporter (.OBJ) (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/mohammedzero43/CSGExport-Godot) - Export CSG nodes to OBJ meshes to improve editing performance.
*   [EffekseerForGodot3 (‚≠ê136)](https://github.com/effekseer/EffekseerForGodot3) - Import [Effekseer](https://effekseer.github.io/en/) particle effects.
*   [Escoria (‚≠ê812)](https://github.com/godotengine/escoria) - Point & click adventure game framework. *(Godot 2 and 3)*
*   [gdstats (‚≠ê35)](https://github.com/droxpopuli/gdstats) - A library of pseudorandom number generators for common statistical distributions.
*   [Godot NExt (‚≠ê980)](https://github.com/godot-extended-libraries/godot-next) - A set of basic node extensions.
*   [GodotNotificationCenter (‚≠ê59)](https://github.com/didier-v/GodotNotificationCenter) - A notification center.
*   [GodotPhoenixChannels (‚≠ê291)](https://github.com/alfredbaudisch/GodotPhoenixChannels) - A GDScript and Godot Engine implementation for the Channels API of the Phoenix Framework.
*   [GodotRx (‚≠ê95)](https://github.com/semickolon/GodotRx) - Reactive extensions for Godot C# (Mono).
*   [GodotTIE (‚≠ê293)](https://github.com/henriquelalves/GodotTIE) - Text Interface Engine to control text output (like in a RPG dialogue). *(Godot 2 and 3)*
*   [InGrid (‚≠ê114)](https://github.com/Larpon/ingrid) - Infinite scrolling grid.
*   [NI mate Motion Capture (‚≠ê30)](https://github.com/hoontee/godot-ni-mate-motion-capture) - Animate Skeletons with a Microsoft Kinect sensor.
*   [Scrolling Background (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/dploeger/godot-scrollingbackground) - A scrolling background node. *(Godot 2 and 3)*
*   [StoryTeller Engine (‚≠ê33)](https://github.com/HeavenMercy/StoryTeller-Engine) - Dialog and interactive fiction engine.
*   [Tiled importer (‚≠ê875)](https://github.com/vnen/godot-tiled-importer) - Import maps from [Tiled](https://www.mapeditor.org/).
*   [TileSet Builder (‚≠ê18)](https://github.com/HeavenMercy/TileSet-Builder-Godot-Plugin) - Quickly build tilesets with style.

### Plugins and scripts / Godot 2

*   [gterm (‚≠ê102)](https://github.com/TeddyDD/gterm) - GUI control that draws something similar to \*nix terminal emulators.

### Plugins and scripts / Godot version unknown

*   [Godot Recipes](https://kidscancode.org/godot_recipes/3.x/) - A large collection of tutorials and techniques, both big and small.
*   [Godot Shaders (‚≠ê3.5k)](https://github.com/GDQuest/godot-shaders) - A large library of free and open-source shaders for 2D and 3D.

### Modules / Godot 4

*   [Entity Spell System (‚≠ê171)](https://github.com/Relintai/entity_spell_system) - An entity and spell system for complex (optionally multiplayer) RPGs. *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [GodotHook (‚≠ê54)](https://github.com/Mestima/GodotHook) - A lite custom event system for Godot Engine. *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [godot-jolt (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/godot-jolt/godot-jolt) - Allows you to use the [Jolt Physics Engine (‚≠ê8.1k)](https://github.com/jrouwe/JoltPhysics).
*   [godot-luaAPI (‚≠ê416)](https://github.com/WeaselGames/godot_luaAPI) - Module for creating sandboxed modding APIs with Lua. *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [godot-rapier-2d (‚≠ê593)](https://github.com/appsinacup/godot-rapier-2d) - A 2D [Rapier (‚≠ê4.6k)](https://github.com/dimforge/rapier) physics server for Godot.
*   [Texture Packer (‚≠ê67)](https://github.com/Relintai/texture_packer) - Tools to layer, pack, and merge textures at runtime. *(Godot 3 and 4)*
*   [Voxelman (‚≠ê105)](https://github.com/Relintai/voxelman) - A voxel engine with more focus on editor integration, gameplay-related features, and extendability. *(Godot 3 and 4)*

### Modules / Godot 3

*   [FMOD Integration (‚≠ê181)](https://github.com/alexfonseka/godot-fmod-integration) - Module to integrate the FMOD audio engine in Godot.
*   [Gdnet for Godot 3 (‚≠ê128)](https://github.com/PerduGames/gdnet3) - An ENet wrapper for Godot 3.
*   [godotcord (‚≠ê54)](https://github.com/drachenfrucht1/godotcord) - A wrapper for the [Discord Game SDK](https://discord.com/developers/docs/game-sdk/sdk-starter-guide).
*   [godot-python (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/touilleMan/godot-python) - Python support for Godot 3.

### Modules / Godot version unknown

*   [godot-anl (‚≠ê111)](https://github.com/Xrayez/godot-anl) - A wrapper for [Accidental Noise Library (‚≠ê82)](https://github.com/JTippetts/accidental-noise-library) with a visual noise editing support.

### Other / Godot version unknown

*   [godot-gdscript-toolkit (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/Scony/godot-gdscript-toolkit) - Independent set of command line tools for working with GDScript - parser, linter and formatter.
items.content_html:
2D / Godot 3

  • Blipshift (‚≠ê14) - Simple top-down moving platforms game.
  • Circle Jump (‚≠ê142) - Mobile arcade game, addicting and enjoyable. How-to-made tutorial is available, so you can recreate it yourself and learn Godot.
  • Haldric (‚≠ê368) - Official work-in-progress reimplementation of Battle for Wesnoth.
  • Memory Game (‚≠ê29) - Simple Memory game.

3D / Godot 4

  • Thrive (‚≠ê3.2k) - A free, open-source game about the evolution of life (Mono).

3D / Godot 3

  • Rapid Rescue (‚≠ê75) - Rapid Rescue is a local multiplayer strategy game inspired by Labyrinth.

Demos / Godot 3

  • Realistic Water Shader (‚≠ê814) - Realistic 3D water shader with foam and caustics.
  • The Tower (‚≠ê28) - A voxel-based parkour game to show the capabilities of the Voxelman module.

Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • 3D Auto Collision Generator (‚≠ê60) - Generate collision for multiple 3D objects in one click.
  • CReverter (Composite Reverter) - Memento-based undo/redo utility that supports composition.
  • Cyclops Level Builder (‚≠ê1.3k) - A level builder for quick prototypes and proof-of-concepts.
  • Dialogue Manager (‚≠ê2.9k) - A simple but powerful text based branching dialogue editor and runtime. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) (‚≠ê51) - Fast Fourier Transform in GDScript.
  • Friflo.Engine.ECS (‚≠ê174) - High-performance C# ECS with simple API. Supports .NET, WASM/WebAssembly, Native AOT, Godot, Unity, MonoGame, ... (Godot 3 and 4)
  • GdUnit4 (‚≠ê750) - Godot Unit Testing Framework.
  • Godot Spin Button (‚≠ê99) - Horizontal Selector with extended options.
  • HTerrain (‚≠ê2k) - Heightmap-based terrain. Supports texture painting, colouring, holes, level of detail and grass. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • Importality (‚≠ê414) - raster graphics and animations importers: Aseprite, Krita, Pencil2D, Piskel, Pixelorama and others.
  • Input Helper (‚≠ê934) - A helper for detecting input devices and remapping controls. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • Orchestrator (‚≠ê1.2k) - Dialog and visual-scripting subsystem for 2D and 3D games.
  • Scene Manager (‚≠ê470) - Make nice and customizable scene transitions in one line of code. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • SignalVisualizer (‚≠ê518) - Displays the current scene's signals and connections in a easy to read graph and tree dock.
  • Simplified Flight Simulation library (‚≠ê238) - A library that helps you create a simple airplane/helicopter/spaceship flight simulator. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • SmartShape2D (‚≠ê1.5k) - A 2D terrain tool. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • Virtual Joystick (‚≠ê852) - A virtual joystick for touchscreens. Simple to use and with useful options. (Godot 3 and 4)

Plugins and scripts / Godot 3

  • 2D Day/Night Cycle (‚≠ê349) - A ‚òÄÔ∏è Day / üåî Night cycle for 2D.
  • 2D Destructible Objects (‚≠ê411) - A script that takes a sprite, divides it into blocks and makes them explodeüí•.
  • Anima (‚≠ê740) - Run sequential and parallel animations with less code compared to Tween.
  • AutoColliders (‚≠ê11) - Allows the automatic generation of colliders for Sprites, with planned expansion to handle 3D meshes in the future.
  • BoxCam2D (‚≠ê19) - Simplest way to implement grid-based 2D camera movement.
  • CRT Shader (‚≠ê312) - A Godot shader that simulates CRT Displays with many shader parameters.
  • CSG Mesh Exporter (.OBJ) (‚≠ê56) - Export CSG nodes to OBJ meshes to improve editing performance.
  • EffekseerForGodot3 (‚≠ê136) - Import Effekseer particle effects.
  • Escoria (‚≠ê812) - Point & click adventure game framework. (Godot 2 and 3)
  • gdstats (‚≠ê35) - A library of pseudorandom number generators for common statistical distributions.
  • Godot NExt (‚≠ê980) - A set of basic node extensions.
  • GodotNotificationCenter (‚≠ê59) - A notification center.
  • GodotPhoenixChannels (‚≠ê291) - A GDScript and Godot Engine implementation for the Channels API of the Phoenix Framework.
  • GodotRx (‚≠ê95) - Reactive extensions for Godot C# (Mono).
  • GodotTIE (‚≠ê293) - Text Interface Engine to control text output (like in a RPG dialogue). (Godot 2 and 3)
  • InGrid (‚≠ê114) - Infinite scrolling grid.
  • NI mate Motion Capture (‚≠ê30) - Animate Skeletons with a Microsoft Kinect sensor.
  • Scrolling Background (‚≠ê29) - A scrolling background node. (Godot 2 and 3)
  • StoryTeller Engine (‚≠ê33) - Dialog and interactive fiction engine.
  • Tiled importer (‚≠ê875) - Import maps from Tiled.
  • TileSet Builder (‚≠ê18) - Quickly build tilesets with style.

Plugins and scripts / Godot 2

  • gterm (‚≠ê102) - GUI control that draws something similar to *nix terminal emulators.

Plugins and scripts / Godot version unknown

  • Godot Recipes - A large collection of tutorials and techniques, both big and small.
  • Godot Shaders (‚≠ê3.5k) - A large library of free and open-source shaders for 2D and 3D.

Modules / Godot 4

  • Entity Spell System (‚≠ê171) - An entity and spell system for complex (optionally multiplayer) RPGs. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • GodotHook (‚≠ê54) - A lite custom event system for Godot Engine. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • godot-jolt (‚≠ê2.4k) - Allows you to use the Jolt Physics Engine (‚≠ê8.1k).
  • godot-luaAPI (‚≠ê416) - Module for creating sandboxed modding APIs with Lua. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • godot-rapier-2d (‚≠ê593) - A 2D Rapier (‚≠ê4.6k) physics server for Godot.
  • Texture Packer (‚≠ê67) - Tools to layer, pack, and merge textures at runtime. (Godot 3 and 4)
  • Voxelman (‚≠ê105) - A voxel engine with more focus on editor integration, gameplay-related features, and extendability. (Godot 3 and 4)

Modules / Godot 3

  • FMOD Integration (‚≠ê181) - Module to integrate the FMOD audio engine in Godot.
  • Gdnet for Godot 3 (‚≠ê128) - An ENet wrapper for Godot 3.
  • godotcord (‚≠ê54) - A wrapper for the Discord Game SDK.
  • godot-python (‚≠ê2k) - Python support for Godot 3.

Modules / Godot version unknown

  • godot-anl (‚≠ê111) - A wrapper for Accidental Noise Library (‚≠ê82) with a visual noise editing support.

Other / Godot version unknown

  • godot-gdscript-toolkit (‚≠ê1.2k) - Independent set of command line tools for working with GDScript - parser, linter and formatter.

items.title: ALL About RSS
items.content_text:
### Terminal-based / programmable RSS readers / Outline Processor Markup Language

*   [cast-text (‚≠ê159)](https://github.com/piqoni/cast-text) [![Open-Source Software](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/open-source.png)](https://github.com/piqoni/cast-text)![Freeware](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/icons8-one-free-16.png)![Linux](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/Linux.png)![Mac](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/icons8-mac-client-16.png)![Windows](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/icons8-windows-10-16.png): a zero-latency, easy-to-use, rss reader.
*   [Syndicationd (‚≠ê125)](https://github.com/ymgyt/syndicationd): a TUI feed viewer written in Rust <sup>[1461](https://t.me/s/aboutrss/1461)</sup> [![Open-Source Software](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/open-source.png)](https://github.com/ymgyt/syndicationd)![Linux](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/Linux.png)![Windows](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/icons8-windows-10-16.png)![Mac](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/icons8-mac-client-16.png)
*   [Cleed (‚≠ê196)](https://github.com/radulucut/cleed) [![Open-Source Software](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/open-source.png)](https://github.com/radulucut/cleed)![Linux](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/Linux.png)![Windows](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/icons8-windows-10-16.png)![Mac](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/icons8-mac-client-16.png)
items.content_html:
Terminal-based / programmable RSS readers / Outline Processor Markup Language

  • cast-text (‚≠ê159) : a zero-latency, easy-to-use, rss reader.
  • Syndicationd (‚≠ê125): a TUI feed viewer written in Rust 1461
  • Cleed (‚≠ê196)

items.title: Awesome Datascience
items.content_text:
### MOOC's

*   [Data Science Skill Tree](https://labex.io/skilltrees/data-science)

### General Machine Learning Packages / Deep Learning architectures

*   [XGBoost (‚≠ê27k)](https://github.com/dmlc/xgboost)
*   [LightGBM (‚≠ê17k)](https://github.com/microsoft/LightGBM)
*   [CatBoost (‚≠ê8.5k)](https://github.com/catboost/catboost)
*   [JAX (‚≠ê33k)](https://github.com/google/jax)

### Deep Learning Packages / Visualization Tools

*   [Dash](https://plotly.com/dash/)

### Podcasts / Book Deals (Affiliated)

*   [Gradient Descent](https://wandb.ai/fully-connected/gradient-descent)
items.content_html:
MOOC's

  • Data Science Skill Tree

General Machine Learning Packages / Deep Learning architectures

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Captcha / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-turnstile (‚≠ê69)](https://github.com/verto-health/ngx-turnstile) - Cloudflare Turnstile for Angular.
*   [ng-hcaptcha (‚≠ê51)](https://github.com/leNicDev/ng-hcaptcha) - Provides an easy to use component for [hCaptcha](https://hcaptcha.com/).
*   [angular-yandex-smart-captcha (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/flowXM/angular-yandex-smart-captcha) - This library adds the Yandex SmartCaptcha component to your Angular application, providing an easy way to integrate CAPTCHA protection into your forms and other user interactions.
*   [go-captcha-angular (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/wenlng/go-captcha-angular) - A simple, easy-to-use, interactive, and secure behavioral verification code that implements verification modes such as text/graphic clicking, sliding/dragging, and rotation.
*   [ng-recaptcha-2 (‚≠ê21)](https://github.com/LakhveerChahal/ng-recaptcha-2) - Angular 18 fork of [ng-recaptcha (‚≠ê479)](https://github.com/DethAriel/ng-recaptcha). Alternatively, you create your own service that implements Google's reCAPTCHA with the help of this [article](https://ben-5.azurewebsites.net/2024/9/5/google-recaptcha-v3-with-angular/#google_vignette).
items.content_html:
Captcha / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-turnstile (‚≠ê69) - Cloudflare Turnstile for Angular.
  • ng-hcaptcha (‚≠ê51) - Provides an easy to use component for hCaptcha.
  • angular-yandex-smart-captcha (‚≠ê1) - This library adds the Yandex SmartCaptcha component to your Angular application, providing an easy way to integrate CAPTCHA protection into your forms and other user interactions.
  • go-captcha-angular (‚≠ê7) - A simple, easy-to-use, interactive, and secure behavioral verification code that implements verification modes such as text/graphic clicking, sliding/dragging, and rotation.
  • ng-recaptcha-2 (‚≠ê21) - Angular 18 fork of ng-recaptcha (‚≠ê479). Alternatively, you create your own service that implements Google's reCAPTCHA with the help of this article.

items.title: Awesome Cyber Security University
items.content_text:

*   [Practice Linux Commands](https://labex.io/courses/linux-basic-commands-practice-online) - A free course with 41 hands-on labs to practice and master the most commonly used Linux commands.

*   [Nmap Tutorials](https://labex.io/tutorials/quick-start-with-nmap-free-tutorials-400132) - Learn and practice the basics of network scanning using Nmap.
